title: Pentakill Tickets?
body: So i bought one of the VIP concert boxes and it had tickets inside. Is there actually a concert in Birmingham?

replies.body: They aren't real :( Sorry about the confusion, but we thought it would be fun to add some gimmick tickets since it was a "Concert Box". Sorry about all the confusion though.

Oh no it's perfectly fine! I just wasn't sure or not and I loved the realistic vibe they had!  Thank you for the fast reply because I was about 5 minutes away from booking a trip to Birmingham. Wouldn't have missed the concert for anything short than a dead Teemo plushie!
